results.title: SR-22 & Insurance: What Is an SR-22? | Progressive
results.description: Due to the fact that some insurers consider SR-22 drivers as high risk, your rate could increase. However, the increase to your policy's rate will vary based on your ZIP code, vehicle, driving record, insurance history, and other factors. Contact your state's department of motor vehicles to find out the exact length of time you'll need to carry an SR-22 — in most states, it's three years. An SR-22 won't automatically fall off your insurance policy once it's no longer needed.

results.title: Progressive Corporation - Wikipedia
